com.github.sbugat.rundeckmonitor

Class VersionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sbugat.rundeckmonitor.VersionChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public final class VersionChecker
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Simple generic version checker on GitHub, inpect target jar and local jar build date to determinated if an update is available. If one is found, download the full jar and replace the original jar via a double restart. The checker use an independant thread to check and download the file. The main thread have to check is the download is done and order to restart the program.
    Author:
    Sylvain Bugat
